title: #020 - UNCLE JOEY'S JOINT
description:
Welcome to Uncle Joey's Joint....

Today we talk about the transfer of addiction & desperation.....

This episode is brought to you by Draftkings & CBD Lion......

Go to https://www.draftkings.com and enter Code: JOEY

Go to https://www.cbdlion.com and enter Code: CHURCH or JOEY

And don’t forget.....

The Mind Of Joey Diaz is on PATREON:

https://www.patreon.com/joeydiaz

#JoeyDiaz #Madflavor #UncleJoeysJoint
